channel.title: SCCM on Frank Doka
channel.description: Recent content in SCCM on Frank Doka

item.title: NYC Department of Correction
item.description: Description Develop and lead large multifunctional system activities including managing, creating and deploying application programs and packages with Microsoft System Center Configuration Manager and Microsoft Deployment Toolkit. Conduct application testing to validate codebase and remediate issues discovered through performance and security testing. Install, configure, troubleshoot, document and proactively maintain physical and virtual servers, systems and applications using VMWare and Hyper-V. Monitor, deploy and maintain server and desktop workstation patches and upgrades.

item.title: NYC Police Department
item.description: Description Provided IT technical support and remote assistance to end-users for computer operational and various peripheral equipment, resolving 1500+ support tickets Assigned and delegated various computer operational work to other technical units and ensured satisfactory completion of tasks. Collaborate with IT teams to ensure timely and effective resolution of technical issues and incidents.
